Issues.Title: Faulting module name: coreclr.dll
Issues.Body:
### .NET version

new6.0-windows

### Did it work in .NET Framework?

No

### Did it work in any of the earlier releases of .NET Core or .NET 5+?

6.0.422.16404 didn't work either.

### Issue description

My application that is supposed to run 24/7 regularly crashes. This is what I see in event viewer:

```
Faulting application name: xx.exe, version: 1.0.0.0, time stamp: 0x62cf0990
Faulting module name: coreclr.dll, version: 6.0.822.36306, time stamp: 0x62cf0045
Exception code: 0xc0000005
Fault offset: 0x00000000001d1fdd
Faulting process id: 0x3ed8
Faulting application start time: 0x01d8c47bc2e2313a
Faulting application path: C:\Data\xx.exe
Faulting module path: C:\Program Files\dotnet\shared\Microsoft.NETCore.App\6.0.8\coreclr.dll
Report Id: 525e6274-83f7-4540-8f3a-471a6655e70a
Faulting package full name: 
Faulting package-relative application ID: 
```

### Steps to reproduce

I have a large project. The program crashes very iregularly - sometimes every like 10 mintes other times it may run for a week without a single crash. Hence, I don't know what exactly causes the crash. Can you advise how to proceed?
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Faulting module name: coreclr.dll" (#7757)

Issues.Title: Everytime I create a new project the designer breaks
Issues.Body:
### Environment

Visual Studio 2022 17.3.3

### .NET version

I use NET 6.0, but it also affected 3.1 & 5.0.

### Did this work in a previous version of Visual Studio and/or previous .NET release?

It did work in the past, but suddenly i just get this error that breaks the form designer.

### Issue description

In every project I create, the form designer just doesnt work.
This is the error it gives me:

```
bei Microsoft.DotNet.DesignTools.Client.Host.ProjectInfoProvider.NetCore.d__6.MoveNext()
--- Ende der Stapelüberwachung vom vorhergehenden Ort, an dem die Ausnahme ausgelöst wurde ---
bei System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.ExceptionDispatchInfo.Throw()
bei System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TaskAwaiter.HandleNonSuccessAndDebuggerNotification(Task task)
bei Microsoft.DotNet.DesignTools.Client.Host.ProjectInfoProvider.d__9.MoveNext()
--- Ende der Stapelüberwachung vom vorhergehenden Ort, an dem die Ausnahme ausgelöst wurde ---
bei System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.ExceptionDispatchInfo.Throw()
bei System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TaskAwaiter.HandleNonSuccessAndDebuggerNotification(Task task)
bei Microsoft.DotNet.DesignTools.Client.Host.ServerHostFactory.d__8.MoveNext()
--- Ende der Stapelüberwachung vom vorhergehenden Ort, an dem die Ausnahme ausgelöst wurde ---
bei System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.ExceptionDispatchInfo.Throw()
bei System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TaskAwaiter.HandleNonSuccessAndDebuggerNotification(Task task)
bei Microsoft.DotNet.DesignTools.Client.DesignToolsClientLoader.d__29.MoveNext()
--- Ende der Stapelüberwachung vom vorhergehenden Ort, an dem die Ausnahme ausgelöst wurde ---
bei System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.ExceptionDispatchInfo.Throw()
bei System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TaskAwaiter.HandleNonSuccessAndDebuggerNotification(Task task)
bei Microsoft.DotNet.DesignTools.Client.DesignToolsClientLoader.<>c__DisplayClass25_1.<<-ctor>b__1>d.MoveNext()
--- Ende der Stapelüberwachung vom vorhergehenden Ort, an dem die Ausnahme ausgelöst wurde ---
bei System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.ExceptionDispatchInfo.Throw()
bei System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TaskAwaiter.HandleNonSuccessAndDebuggerNotification(Task task)
bei Microsoft.DotNet.DesignTools.Client.DesignToolsClientLoader.d__27.MoveNext() 
```

### Steps to reproduce

Create any WinForms project, doesnt matter if its NET 3.1, 5.0 or 6.0.

### Diagnostics

_No response_
![Screenshot (75)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/107318006/189385781-90266a43-95f6-4d78-b104-c5ce6a114e92.png)

Issues.Title: Fixed HasKeyboardFocusProperty for DGV's AO
Issues.Body:
<!-- Please read CONTRIBUTING.md before submitting a pull request -->

Fixes #7723


## Proposed changes

- Restored condition as suggested (https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/6102/files#r851568124)
- Fixed unit tests 

<!-- We are in TELL-MODE the following section must be completed -->

## Customer Impact

- The Narrator has correct focus on non-empty DGV.

## Regression? 

- Yes

## Risk

- Minimal

<!-- end TELL-MODE -->


## Screenshots <!-- Remove this section if PR does not change UI -->

### Before

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/109065597/188867740-3301495b-626a-4ec6-baa8-6ad73c4c7ac9.png)
_Not modal window._
![188046113-107a653d-41eb-4aac-aba5-37ce9970c83b](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/109065597/188867875-4f89cd89-060d-4056-83c6-45a71db10ca1.gif)
_Modal window._
### After

![EPE0pxu8aQ](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/109065597/188868156-55bcacff-14f4-453c-9bf9-4fc15d1f23cf.gif)
_Not modal window._
![cE08RXuR73](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/109065597/188868178-a2429334-0765-4cec-a8bf-582ca2f6f970.gif)
_Modal window._


## Test methodology <!-- How did you ensure quality? -->

- Manually.
- Narrator.
- Unit testing.

## Accessibility testing  <!-- Remove this section if PR does not change UI -->

- Narrator.


 

## Test environment(s) <!-- Remove any that don't apply -->

- 8.0.100-alpha.1.22423.9


In modal window announces the content of the dialog up to the focused control. (https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/winauto/uiauto-automation-element-propids, see UIA_IsDialogPropertyId)

Issues.Title: [Accessibility] [HC] ComboBox control's FlatStyle is not displayed correctly in design and runtime when set FlatStyle property to Flat or Popup
Issues.Body:
### .NET version

8.0.100-alpha.1.22430.2

### Did it work in .NET Framework?

Yes

### Did it work in any of the earlier releases of .NET Core or .NET 5+?

Yes, it works in .NET 6.0.
![6 0-Aquatic](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45864985/188091624-debb1e8b-60fe-4f12-bba5-0f2a4226e35e.png)


### Issue description

On Windows 11 and Windows 10 all high contrast themes, the ComboBox control's FlatStyle is not displayed correctly in design and runtime when set FlatStyle property to Flat or Popup.

Windows 11 HC Aquatic/Desert/Dusk/Night Sky testing results:
![Win11-1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45864985/188093170-8303c05b-23d3-4d8e-b76f-8310914844b2.png)
![Win11-2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45864985/188093213-746dfdff-87fd-4d7a-83ff-a7e48ec1fcea.png)
![Win11-3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45864985/188093242-c2d4547a-a91d-4d82-ac46-b145c0fd4101.png)
![Win11-4](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45864985/188093280-188c0f7a-9585-4401-8472-590a3986388f.png)

Windows 11 default theme:
![Win11-Expected](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45864985/188093456-de5a9967-929c-4be5-af5c-2b68ea370705.png)

Windows 10 HC #1/#2/black/white testing result:
![Win10-1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45864985/188093533-14c8fba7-9ff2-4c93-a9e5-26735d7d02f5.png)
![Win10-2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45864985/188093559-f4fdb6fa-03b8-4351-8d42-3a87c8c020b0.png)
![Win10-3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45864985/188093590-23619cae-107a-42dd-85ae-51d51d690ed9.png)
![Win10-4](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45864985/188093635-11acd434-d7e9-4f77-9e9e-4040f2a1eeb6.png)

Windows 10 default theme:
![Win10-Expected](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45864985/188093689-38587ee4-633e-4904-b82a-d533ddff3f37.png)


### Steps to reproduce

1. Set OS' theme to high contrast.
2. Open the [TestApp.zip](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/files/9475963/TestApp.zip) project.
3. Open Form1 designer and observe the ComboBox controls in **Flat** and **Popup** columns.
4. Run the project, and observe the ComboBox controls in **Flat** and **Popup** columns too.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "[Accessibility] [HC] ComboBox control's FlatStyle is not displayed correctly in design and runtime when set FlatStyle property to Flat or Popup" (#7727)

Issues.Title: [Servicing] Fixing "Collection was modified ..." exception while MonthCalendar AO tree rebuilding
Issues.Body:
Fixes https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/issues/7714
.NET 8.0 PR #7738

The reason of the bug was calling RebuildAccessibilityTree 2 times at the same time via CalendarViewChanged and DisplayRangeChanged events.
Removed CalendarViewChanged event using because it duplicates the work of DisplayRangeChanged and leads to the exception. We release elements the first rebuilding time and catch the exception while the second call.

## Servicing reasons

- The regression breaks accessibility work of `MonthCalendar` in .NET 7.0 only after [#7362](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/7362) and [#7569](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/7569)

## Proposed changes

- Remove extra `CalendarViewChanged` usage
- Remove extra cleaning methods that duplicate disconnection methods work

<!-- We are in TELL-MODE the following section must be completed -->

## Customer Impact

- There is no the exception while using Narrator with MonthCalendar


## Regression? 

- Yes ([#7362](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/7362) and [#7569](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/7569) exposed the problem in [#4758](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/4758))

## Risk

- Minimal

## Test methodology <!-- How did you ensure quality? -->

- CTI
- Manual testing

## Accessibility testing  <!-- Remove this section if PR does not change UI -->

- Using Narrator and AI


## Test environment(s) <!-- Remove any that don't apply -->

- .NET 7.0
- Windows 11

Issues.Title: Got an exception when a TextBlock got focus: `System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException:“Argument_CultureNotSupportedInInvariantMode Arg_ParamName_Name, culture Argument_CultureInvalidIdentifier, 2052 (0x0804)”`
Issues.Body:
### .NET version

 Version:   6.0.303
 Commit:    7494fee64a

### Did it work in .NET Framework?

No

### Did it work in any of the earlier releases of .NET Core or .NET 5+?

I don't know how to switch a wpf project target SDK.

### Issue description

My code works well when I build it for debug, but not working in release mode.

There are two textblock in this window, and the exception will be throwed when I click any textblock. But  the exception will NOT be throwed in debug build mode.

```log
System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException:“Argument_CultureNotSupportedInInvariantMode Arg_ParamName_Name, culture Argument_CultureInvalidIdentifier, 2052 (0x0804)”
```
```xml
<Window x:Class="Logistical.QueueManagementClient.Forms.LoginWindow"
        xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
        xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
        xmlns:d="http://schemas.microsoft.com/expression/blend/2008"
        xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006"
        xmlns:local="clr-namespace:Logistical.QueueManagementClient"
        mc:Ignorable="d"
        Closing="Window_Closing"
        Title="登录" Height="573" Width="978">
    <Window.Resources>
        <!--依赖属性 本页面用的样式-->
        <Style TargetType="Button">
            <Setter Property="Background" Value="Gold"></Setter>
            <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Black"></Setter>
            <Setter Property="FontSize" Value="20"></Setter>
        </Style>
    </Window.Resources>
    <Grid >
        <!--定义行 2行 比例59:361-->
        <Grid.RowDefinitions>
            <RowDefinition Height="2*"/>
            <RowDefinition Height="3*"/>
            <RowDefinition Height="1*"/>
        </Grid.RowDefinitions>
        <!--定义列 2列 比例51:208-->
        <Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
            <ColumnDefinition Width="20*"/>
            <ColumnDefinition Width="55*"/>
            <ColumnDefinition Width="20*"/>
        </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
        <!--在第一行，第二列写入一个按钮 
        Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" 是索引 
        Grid.Row="0"表示第一行
        Grid.Column="1"  表示第二列-->
        <StackPanel  Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" HorizontalAlignment="Center">
            <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Height="30">
                <Label  Content="用户名" Width="60"/>
                <TextBox x:Name="user"  Text="admin" Width="200"/>
            </StackPanel>
            <StackPanel  Orientation="Horizontal" Height="30">
                <Label  Content="密    码" Width="60"/>
                <PasswordBox  x:Name="password" Width="200" />
            </StackPanel>
            <Button x:Name="loginBtn" Margin="22" Height="30" Background="{x:Null}" Content="登录" Click="LoginBtn_ClickAsync"/>
        </StackPanel>
    </Grid>
</Window>
```

### Steps to reproduce

```xml
<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk">

	<PropertyGroup>
		<RuntimeIdentifier>win-x64</RuntimeIdentifier>
		<OutputType>WinExe</OutputType>
		<TargetFramework>net6.0-windows</TargetFramework>
		<Nullable>enable</Nullable>
		<UseWPF>true</UseWPF>
		<SelfContained>true</SelfContained>
		<PublishSingleFile>false</PublishSingleFile>
	</PropertyGroup>

	<ItemGroup>
		<PackageReference Include="System.Text.Json" Version="6.0.2" />
		<PackageReference Include="System.Text.Encoding.CodePages" Version="6.0.0" />
	</ItemGroup>
	
</Project>
```
```xml
<Window x:Class="Logistical.QueueManagementClient.Forms.LoginWindow"
        xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
        xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
        xmlns:d="http://schemas.microsoft.com/expression/blend/2008"
        xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006"
        xmlns:local="clr-namespace:Logistical.QueueManagementClient"
        mc:Ignorable="d"
        Closing="Window_Closing"
        Title="登录" Height="573" Width="978">
    <Window.Resources>
        <!--依赖属性 本页面用的样式-->
        <Style TargetType="Button">
            <Setter Property="Background" Value="Gold"></Setter>
            <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Black"></Setter>
            <Setter Property="FontSize" Value="20"></Setter>
        </Style>
    </Window.Resources>
    <Grid >
        <!--定义行 2行 比例59:361-->
        <Grid.RowDefinitions>
            <RowDefinition Height="2*"/>
            <RowDefinition Height="3*"/>
            <RowDefinition Height="1*"/>
        </Grid.RowDefinitions>
        <!--定义列 2列 比例51:208-->
        <Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
            <ColumnDefinition Width="20*"/>
            <ColumnDefinition Width="55*"/>
            <ColumnDefinition Width="20*"/>
        </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
        <!--在第一行，第二列写入一个按钮 
        Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" 是索引 
        Grid.Row="0"表示第一行
        Grid.Column="1"  表示第二列-->
        <StackPanel  Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" HorizontalAlignment="Center">
            <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Height="30">
                <Label  Content="用户名" Width="60"/>
                <TextBox x:Name="user"  Text="admin" Width="200"/>
            </StackPanel>
            <StackPanel  Orientation="Horizontal" Height="30">
                <Label  Content="密    码" Width="60"/>
                <PasswordBox  x:Name="password" Width="200" />
            </StackPanel>
            <Button x:Name="loginBtn" Margin="22" Height="30" Background="{x:Null}" Content="登录" Click="LoginBtn_ClickAsync"/>
        </StackPanel>
    </Grid>
</Window>
```

build it in release mode and click a textInput area, and it will crash.

Issues.Title: Implementing UIA provider for TextBox and MaskedTextBox controls
Issues.Body:
<!-- Please read CONTRIBUTING.md before submitting a pull request -->

Fixes #3421 


## Proposed changes

- Enabled UIA provider for `TextBox` with nested classes and `MaskedTextBox`.
- Refactored `TextBox's` child classes to reduce extra code.
- Implemented `IValueProvider` for `TextBoxBaseAccessibleObject`.
- Raised `AutomationFocusChangedEvent` in `OnGotFocus` methods.
- Added few unit tests.

<!-- We are in TELL-MODE the following section must be completed -->

## Customer Impact

- Improving development experience for `TextBox` with nested classes and `MaskedTextBox` control accessibility.



## Regression? 

- No

## Risk

- Minimal

<!-- end TELL-MODE -->

### Did it work in any of the earlier releases of .NET Core or .NET 5+?

No, it is not a regression issue

### Issue description

Cu**rrent Behavior:**
Menustrips' child control textbox borders are not visible
HC Aquatic theme:
![A6](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/104609169/188589900-c1403e7c-40a4-4861-9c24-2d72744781f0.png)


HC Desert theme:
![A2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/104609169/188589977-85983551-4492-4968-a120-1f9d6d4e2892.png)


HC Dusk theme:
![A3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/104609169/188590019-bd145af5-e015-4a5f-8587-32e6e74b4dc7.png)


HC Night Sky theme:
![A4](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/104609169/188590061-826f1679-9a22-4701-838c-6dd7328102f6.png)


E**xpected Behavior:**
Menustrips' child control textbox borders can be seen
![1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/104609169/188532860-eb07a017-890c-4009-9156-97b772ca7875.png)





### Steps to reproduce

1. Turn on High Contrast theme in Windows settings
2. Create a WinForms .NET core project
3. Add MenuStrip control
4. Add child controls MenuItem, TextBox, ComboBox respectively
5. Ctrl+Shift+A add a Application Manifest File and uncomment windows 10
6. Build and run

**More Info:**

1. This issue is repro on all HC themes.
2. This issue is repro on framework project.

Issues.Title: Fixing "Collection was modified ..." exception while MonthCalendar AO tree rebuilding
Issues.Body:
Fixes #7714
Port to .NET 7.0 is PR #7739

The reason of the bug was calling `RebuildAccessibilityTree` 2 times at the same time via `CalendarViewChanged` and `DisplayRangeChanged` events.
Removed `CalendarViewChanged` event using because it duplicates the work of `DisplayRangeChanged` and leads to the exception. We release elements the first rebuilding time and catch the exception while the second call.

## Proposed changes 

- Remove extra `CalendarViewChanged` usage
- Remove extra cleaning methods that duplicate disconnection methods work

<!-- We are in TELL-MODE the following section must be completed -->

## Customer Impact

- There is no the exception while using Narrator with MonthCalendar

## Regression? 

- Yes ([#7362](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/7362) and [#7569](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/7569) exposed the problem in [#4758](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/4758))

## Risk

- Minimal

## Test methodology <!-- How did you ensure quality? -->

- CTI
- Manual testing

## Accessibility testing  <!-- Remove this section if PR does not change UI -->

- Using Narrator and AI


## Test environment(s) <!-- Remove any that don't apply -->

- .NET 8.0
- Windows 11

Issues.Title: [Accessibility] LinkLabel's color contrast is less than 4.5:1 when clicking it
Issues.Body:
### .NET version

8.0.100-alpha.1.22451.15

### Did it work in .NET Framework?

No

### Did it work in any of the earlier releases of .NET Core or .NET 5+?

No

### Issue description
